mapper.select: select id, name, electricity_cabinet_id, type, index, url, bucket_name, is_oss, create_time, update_time, del_flag from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_file where id = #{id}
select id, name, electricity_cabinet_id, type, index, url, bucket_name, is_oss, create_time, update_time, del_flag from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_file limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_file(name, electricity_cabinet_id, type, index, url, bucket_name, is_oss, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{name}, #{electricityCabinetId}, #{type}, #{index}, #{url}, #{bucketName}, #{isOss}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_file
name = #{name},
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
type = #{type},
index = #{index},
url = #{url},
bucket_name = #{bucketName},
is_oss = #{isOss},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
update electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_file set del_flag=1 where id = #{id}
